name: Bust A Nut on Fresh03!!
description:
The "**I Can Make it Better Challenge**" mixed live with Fresh03!

A Remix on Bust a Nut from Alissa on ELR:
e-liquid-recipes.com/recipe/99179/Bust-a-Nut

FLV Sweet Coconut adds a nice moistness to the profile per Dawn's suggestion.
author: SteamOn

reviews.text: not bad for a one and done mix without revisions (I watched the live video) but it doesn't nail it for me. it's missing something I can't quite put my fingers on. I like the sweet coconut addition and you can tell it's there, but something is definitely missing. still fery enjoyable though.
